item.title: 早间竞标：地缘政治浇灭了降息的希望
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 伍德赛德（Woodside）利润和股息超出预期，Driftwood 股权出售备受关注
item.description: 澳大利亚伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周二报告称，由于油价下跌，该公司半年利润下降了 14%，但其业绩和股息均好于市场预期，使其股价上涨了 4%。【原文：Australia's Woodside Energy reported a 14% decline in half-year profit on Tuesday on lower oil prices but the result and its dividend came in better than market expectations, sending its shares 4% higher.】

item.title: 波音公司称未来 20 年中国将需要 8830 架新飞机
item.description: 美国飞机制造商波音公司周一表示，随着中国航空业的扩张和现代化以满足日益增长的客运和货运需求，预计到2043年中国将需要8830架新飞机。【原文：U.S. planemaker Boeing said on Monday it expects China to need 8,830 new planes through 2043, as the country's aviation industry expands and modernizes to meet growing demand for passenger and cargo air travel.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪将在越野电动汽车中使用华为先进的自动驾驶系统
item.description: 华为周二发表声明称，中国电动车巨头比亚迪已与华为（HWT.UL）签署协议，将在其越野方成宝电动车（EV）中使用华为先进的自动驾驶系统。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD has signed an agreement with Huawei (HWT.UL) to use the Chinese tech conglomerate's advanced autonomous driving system in its off-road Fangchengbao electric vehicles (EV), Huawei said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华平-Lendlease 合资平台以 12.3 亿美元收购新加坡资产组合
item.description: 总部位于美国的全球投资者华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）和澳大利亚房地产集团 Lendlease 周二表示，他们的合资平台已在新加坡收购了一个价值 16 亿新元（12 亿美元）的资产组合。【原文：U.S-based global investor Warburg Pincus and Australian real estate group Lendlease said on Tuesday their joint venture platform has acquired a S$1.6 billion ($1.2 billion) portfolio of assets in Singapore.】

item.title: 销售强劲，澳大利亚 Coles 年度利润超预期，股价大涨
item.description: 澳大利亚杂货商 Coles 周二公布的年度利润超出预期，主要得益于强劲的超市销售和为遏制盗窃相关损失而加强的库存控制，其股价创下两年来的新高。【原文：Australian grocer Coles reported annual profit ahead of expectations on Tuesday, driven by robust supermarket sales and enhanced inventory control to curb theft-related losses, sending its shares to a two-year high.】

item.title: 地缘政治忧虑削弱信心，亚洲股市下滑
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市下跌，原因是投资者在思考迫在眉睫的美国降息以及等待人工智能宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）的财报，而中东紧张局势加剧和供应担忧抑制了风险情绪，并抬高了油价。【原文：Asian stocks fell on Tuesday as investors pondered looming U.S. interest rate cuts and awaited earnings from AI darling Nvidia, while rising tensions in the Middle East and supply concerns checked risk sentiment and lifted oil prices.】

item.title: 油价因利比亚停电和中东紧张局势飙升后暂停上涨
item.description: 由于担心中东冲突扩大和利比亚油田关闭引发对供应的担忧，油价暂停了近期的涨势，在周二的亚洲交易中回落。【原文：Oil prices paused their recent advances, receding in Asian trading on Tuesday after surging more than 7% in the previous three sessions on supply concerns prompted by fears of a wider Middle East conflict and the shutdown of Libyan oil fields.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克表示支持加州要求对人工智能模型进行安全测试的法案
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）也是社交媒体平台 X 的所有者，他在周一表示，他认为加州应该通过一项人工智能法案，要求科技公司和人工智能开发商对自己的一些车型进行安全测试。【原文：Tesla chief Elon Musk, who also owns social media platform X, said on Monday he feels California should pass an AI bill that would require tech companies and AI developers to conduct safety testing on some of their own models.】

item.title: 中东风险削弱降息乐观情绪，货币走势趋缓
item.description: 由于对中东紧张局势的担忧挥之不去，部分抵消了投资者对美国即将降息的乐观情绪，周二美元走高，主要货币横盘整理。【原文：The dollar edged higher on Tuesday and major currencies traded sideways as lingering concerns over tensions in the Middle East partially offset investors' optimism for imminent U.S. interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 媒体执行官布朗夫曼退出收购派拉蒙的竞争
item.description: 媒体资深人士小埃德加-布朗夫曼（Edgar Bronfman Jr）退出了派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）控制权的争夺，他在周一表示。【原文：Media veteran Edgar Bronfman Jr pulled out of the race to take control of Paramount Global , he said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，DirecTV 希望在迪士尼谈判中延续付费电视规则
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，华特迪士尼公司正在与付费电视供应商 DirecTV 谈判续约事宜，如果双方不能达成协议，ABC 和 ESPN 等频道最早将于 9 月 1 日停播。【原文：Walt Disney Co is in talks with pay-TV provider DirecTV to renew a contract that could result in channels like ABC and ESPN being blacked out as early as Sept. 1 if an agreement between them is not reached, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 调查显示，英国商店价格近三年来首次下降
item.description: 本周二的一项调查显示，受夏季服装和家庭用品销售的推动，本月英国商店的年度价格自2021年10月以来首次出现下降。【原文：British shop prices fell in annual terms this month for the first time since October 2021, pushed down by summer sales of clothes and household goods, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 必和必拓年度利润增长 2%，表示愿意为收购增加债务
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周二公布的年度基本利润好于预期，原因是其铁矿石和铜矿业务实现了增长，并表示可以为任何潜在收购提高债务目标。【原文：BHP Group reported a better-than-expected annual underlying profit on Tuesday due to growth at its iron ore and copper businesses and said it was comfortable with raising its debt target for any potential acquisitions.】

item.title: 家装零售商劳氏公司是最新一家终止部分多元化政策的美国公司
item.description: 家装零售商劳氏公司（Lowe's）取消了部分多元化、公平和包容（DEI）计划，成为最新一家修改此类政策以提高种族和民族代表性的美国公司。【原文：Home improvement retailer Lowe's has scrapped some of its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) programs, becoming the latest U.S. firm to modify such policies meant to boost racial and ethnic representation.】

item.title: 早间竞价紧张地徘徊在美国加息道路上
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院裁定，特斯拉可挑战路易斯安那州的直销禁令
item.description: 周一，联邦上诉法院出现分歧，恢复了特斯拉对路易斯安那州禁止向消费者直接销售汽车的诉讼。【原文：A divided federal appeals court on Monday revived Tesla's lawsuit challenging Louisiana's ban on direct vehicle sales to consumers.】

item.title: 苹果任命内部人士凯文-帕瑞克（Kevan Parekh）为财务总监，取代梅斯特里
item.description: 苹果公司周一任命内部人士凯文-帕瑞克（Kevan Parekh）为首席财务官，接替将于 2025 年 1 月 1 日卸任的卢卡-梅斯特里（Luca Maestri）。【原文：Apple on Monday named insider Kevan Parekh as its chief financial officer, replacing Luca Maestri who will transition from the role on Jan. 1, 2025.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织任命牙买加财政部长担任副职
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周一任命牙买加财政部长奈杰尔-克拉克（Nigel Clarke）担任该机构的高级职务，在此之前，这位官员曾率先在这个加勒比国家进行财政改革。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Monday named Jamaican Finance Minister Nigel Clarke to a top post at the agency, after the official spearheaded fiscal reforms in the Caribbean nation.】

item.title: 银行业输掉对 CFPB 小企业贷款规则的挑战
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）通过了一项规定，要求贷款机构收集小企业借款人的人口统计数据，一名联邦法官周一驳回了银行业支持的对该规定的质疑。【原文：A federal judge on Monday rejected a banking industry-backed challenge to a rule adopted by the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau that requires lenders to gather demographic data on small business borrowers.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会称，纽约梅隆银行将就掉期报告和监管失误支付 500 万美元
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）指控纽约梅隆银行（Bank of New York Mellon）多次未能正确报告数百万笔掉期交易，违反了之前的一项命令，该监管机构在周一的一份声明中表示，同意支付 500 万美元和解。【原文：The Bank of New York Mellon has agreed to pay $5 million to settle U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission charges for repeatedly failing to correctly report millions of swap transactions, violating a previous order, the regulator said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 戴利称美联储下月最有可能降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，降息的 "时机已到"，可能首先将借贷成本降低四分之一个百分点。 当被问及是否有什么事情会破坏美国央行在9月17-18日政策会议上的降息行动时，戴利告诉彭博电视台，"目前很难想象"。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly on Monday said "the time is upon us" to cut interest rates, likely starting with a quarter-percentage point reduction in borrowing costs. Asked if there is anything that could derail a rate cut at the U.S. central bank's Sept. 17-18 policy meeting, Daly told Bloomberg TV that it "would be hard to imagine at this point."】

item.title: 加拿大停工结束后，美国铁路取消禁运
item.description: 美国诺福克南方铁路公司（Norfolk Southern）和 BNSF 铁路公司周一表示，与加拿大可能发生的停工有关的所有禁运均已取消，受影响的铁路运输已经恢复，从而结束了前所未有的跨境货物运输服务中断。【原文：U.S. railroads Norfolk Southern and BNSF Railway on Monday said all embargoes associated with the potential Canadian work stoppage stand canceled and affected rail traffic has resumed, putting an end to an unprecedented service disruption in the movement of goods across the border.】

item.title: 摩根大通因低利率扫码取现遭起诉
item.description: 摩根大通在一项新的诉讼中被指控将客户的闲置现金转入利率 "不合理 "的低账户。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has been accused in a new lawsuit of sweeping customers' idle cash into accounts with "unreasonably" low interest rates.】

item.title: Meta 与 Sage Geosystems 达成地热能源协议，为数据中心供电
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta Platforms 周一在一份声明中表示，该公司向 Sage Geosystems 公司购买多达 150 兆瓦的地热能，用于为其数据中心供电，因为该公司正在努力建设基础设施，以支持其大量耗能的人工智能投资。【原文：Facebook owner Meta Platforms struck a deal to buy up to 150 MW of geothermal power from Sage Geosystems to supply its data centers, as it races to build out the infrastructure to support its massive energy-hungry artificial intelligence investments, it said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 航空监管机构敦促全球努力解决气流问题
item.description: 在蒙特利尔举行的一次监管机构会议上，最近发生的一些备受瞩目的事件促使人们呼吁改进跨境预测。【原文：Recent high-profile incidents are prompting calls to improve forecasting across borders at a Montreal gathering of regulators.】

item.title: 壳牌计划关闭 Zydeco 输油管道的不同部分
item.description: 壳牌石油公司周一表示，计划从 9 月 24 日起关闭其 Zydeco 输油管道系统的不同部分，为期三至四天。【原文：Oil major Shell on Monday said it plans to shut-in different portions of its Zydeco pipeline system for three to four days starting Sept 24.】

item.title: Care.com 就会员续费问题与美国联邦贸易委员会达成 850 万美元的和解协议
item.description: Care.com 是一个为儿童、老年人和宠物提供居家护理服务的平台，该公司同意支付 850 万美元，以了结美国联邦贸易委员会对其严重夸大可用工作数量并使客户难以取消会员资格的指控。【原文：Care.com, a platform for providing in-home care services to children, older adults and pets, agreed to pay $8.5 million to settle U.S. Federal Trade Commission charges it grossly inflated the number of available jobs and made it difficult for customers to cancel memberships.】

item.title: 美国劳工机构称，Chipotle 拒绝为工会工人加薪
item.description: 美国劳工委员会检察官认定，一家工会声称 Chipotle Mexican Grill 公司非法拒绝为密歇根州一家餐厅的工人加薪，因为这些工人是该快餐连锁店第一批也是唯一一批加入工会的员工。【原文：U.S. labor board prosecutors have determined that a union's claims that Chipotle Mexican Grill illegally refused to give raises to workers at a Michigan restaurant after they became the first and only employees of the fast-casual chain to unionize have merit.】

item.title: 苹果公司将于 9 月 9 日举行秋季发布会，预计将推出新款 iPhone
item.description: 苹果公司周一表示，将于 9 月 9 日在加利福尼亚州库比蒂诺举行秋季新品发布会，预计届时将推出新款 iPhone 系列。【原文：Apple said on Monday it will hold its fall event on Sept. 9 in Cupertino, California, during which it is expected to launch its new iPhone series.】
